name: Hinedere Beat
description: Hinedere Beat is a pseudo 8-bit, quasi-cinematic platformer with minor stealth elements and visual novel-style storytelling. Much of the platforming is parkour-influenced, progression is linear, and its story is one of cynicism.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 57 MB available space Additional Notes: Recommended for use with Xbox One and Xbox 360 Controllers
